@{EventID=4104; ScriptBlockText=$Username = "User1";$pwd = "123456789!A1a"; $UserParams = @{'Name' = $Username; 'Password' = (ConvertTo-SecureString -String $pwd -AsPlainText -Force); 'PasswordNeverExpires' = $true};New-LocalUser @UserParams;$GroupParams = @{'Group' = 'Administrators'; 'Member' = $Username};Add-LocalGroupMember @GroupParams;
; ScriptBlockId=1c507029-f043-418d-ae12-767deba0e8b0; MessageNumber=1; MessageTotal=1; Path=}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Adversaries may manipulate accounts to maintain access to victim systems.
Account manipulation may consist of any action that preserves adversary access to a compromised account, such as modifying credentials or permission groups

match_context.values: @{EventID=4104; ScriptBlockText=Add-MpPreference -ExclusionPath "C:\Program Files";; ScriptBlockId=cbe21e3b-4222-4807-bffc-c275cc43c452; MessageNumber=1; Path=; MessageTotal=1}

@{EventID=4720; UserWorkstations=%%1793; PrimaryGroupId=513; DisplayName=%%1793; SamAccountName=User1; UserParameters=%%1793; NewUacValue=21; UserAccountControl=
		%%2080
		%%2082
		%%2084; LogonHours=%%1797; SubjectUserName=DESKTOP-B0T93D6$; HomePath=%%1793; TargetDomainName=DESKTOP-B0T93D6; SubjectLogonId=999; ScriptPath=%%1793; HomeDirectory=%%1793; TargetSid=S-1-5-21-1015118539-3749460369-599379286-1002; TargetUserName=User1; ProfilePath=%%1793; SubjectUserSid=S-1-5-18; SubjectDomainName=WORKGROUP}

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: POLICY-OTHER HTTP request by IPv4 address attempt
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tcp any any -> any $HTTP_PORTS ( msg:"POLICY-OTHER HTTP request by IPv4 address attempt"; flow:to_server,established; http_header; content:"Host:",fast_pattern,nocase; pcre:"/^Host\x3a\s*(?:(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9]?[0-9])\.){3}(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9]?[0-9])\s*:?\s*\d*\s*$/ims"; service:http; reference:url,www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec15.html; classtype:policy-violation; sid:50447; rev:1; )
